content:
I will give you some context, just answer "read" if you read the following text, don't say anything else.

Our multilingual reception team is available 24/7. In addition to organising taxis or restaurant bookings, they will be delighted to help you with any questions concerning your stay in Paris and help make it as carefree and relaxing as possible. Unfortunately pets are not allowed in the hotel. On the 6th floor the rooms benefit from a private balcony and are exclusively accessible by stairs.

We offer free Wi-Fi access throughout our hotel. If you need to connect to Internet, a computer with high speed connexion and printer is at your disposal in our comfortable lounge.

24h Reception
Luggage room
Airport transfer (charges apply)
Tour desk
Fax/photocopying service
Lift
Safe
Heating
Non smoking hotel
Air conditioning
Free! Children under the age of 2 may stay free of charge in parents’ room and in existing bedding. No extra bed or cot available.
The hotel has a room suited for people with reduced mobility.
